page.title: 14NEYLAND NEWS, JUNE 1985
page.content:
The local newspaper for the 26th. June held this news:
{NEW RESTAURANT Recently a new restaurant has been opened called "Buffers." {CARNIVAL WEEK Carnival week starts on July 13th.. There will be several cricket matches, a "Super Star" competition,"It's a Knockout" and a walking Treasure Hunt. On Saturday, 20th. June there will be a parade of Carnival Floats through the streets. {FUN RUN} Neyland Round Table are helping to organise a Heart Beat Fun Run of 10,000 metres. Half the funds will go to Heart Beat Wales and the rest to local charities.
